column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The drinks were okay
column2: not anything to write home about. The appetizers were pretty good including the Buffalo chicken dip and the pig candy
column3: which was their play on cracklins. I ended up getting the short rib as my main entree. Well
column4: honestly we all did because it seemed to be the best option on the menu. It didn't disappoint
column5: it was tender flavorful and a pretty generous portion.
